.card{width:70vw;height:70vh}#step-1 .donate-grid .card h2{font-size:2em}#step-2 .steps-counter .container{width:80vw}#step-2 .go-back{margin:0 auto;text-align:center;display:block}#step-2 .background .background #whole-background-img{display:block}#step-3 .background #half-background-img{display:none}#step-3 .card{height:70vh}#step-3 .card p{max-width:69vw;font-size:1.2em}#step-3 .card #step-3-header{font-size:2.7em}#step-3 .card img{width:45%}#step-3 .card .input-field{margin-bottom:3vh}#step-3 .card .a-button{font-size:1.2em}}@media (max-width:575px){#step-1 .donate-grid .card h2{font-size:1.4em}#step-1 .donate-grid .card p{font-size:1.1em}#step-1 .donate-grid .card .currencyTag{font-size:50px}#step-1 .slidecontainer .amount{width:290px;margin:0 auto 20px;position:relative}#step-2 #payment-grid .card h2{font-size:1.4em}}#research-contact{position:static}#research-contact main .background{width:100vw;max-width:100%;height:100vh;overflow:hidden;position:fixed;bottom:0;left:0;z-index:-100}#research-contact main .background #whole-background-img{display:none}#research-contact main .background>div{position:relative;bottom:0;left:0;width:100vw;max-width:100%;height:100vh}#research-contact main .background img{height:100vh;position:absolute;bottom:0;left:0}#research-contact main .card{background:#fff;width:70vw;height:80vh;position:absolute;top:0;left:0;bottom:0;right:0;margin:auto;padding:20px;z-index:10}#research-contact main .card header{text-align:center}#research-contact main .card header h2{font-size:30px;margin-bottom:20px}#research-contact main .card header p{line-height:25px}#research-contact main .card .contact-form{height:60vh;width:100%;display:flex;flex-direction:column;justify-content:center;align-items:center}#research-contact main .card form{width:400px;margin:0 auto;position:relative}#research-contact main .card form .input-field{width:400px;margin-top:13px}#research-contact main .card form .text-area{width:400px;margin-top:4px}#research-contact main .card form .text-area textarea{min-width:400px}#research-contact main .card form .submit{text-align:center}#research-contact main .card form .submit .loading-icon{display:none}#research-contact main .card form .submit.move-up{display:inline;position:absolute;transform:translateY(-100px);left:0;right:0;margin:0 auto;z-index:55;transition:all .3s}#research-contact main .card form .submit.move-up input{position:absolute;color:transparent;border-radius:50%;padding:0;margin-top:0;height:60px;width:60px;transition:all .3s}#research-contact main .card form .submit.move-up .container{height:60px;width:60px;display:inline-block;position:relative;top:0;left:0}#research-contact main .card form .submit.move-up .container .loading-icon{display:inline-block;position:absolute;top:0;left:0;right:0;bottom:0;margin:auto;height:10px;width:10px;background:#fff;border-radius:50%;animation:loadingAnimation 3s ease-in-out infinite;z-index:100;opacity:1;transition:all .3s}#research-contact main .card form .submit.move-up .container .check{opacity:0;display:inline-block;width:4px;height:32px;background:#fff;position:absolute;left:0;right:0;bottom:0;margin:auto;transform:rotate(32deg);top:0;left:11px;transition:all .3s}#research-contact main .card form .submit.move-up .container .check:last-of-type{height:15px;transform:rotate(-35deg);top:8px;left:-15px}#research-contact main .card form .submit.move-up .container.send .loading-icon{opacity:0}#research-contact main .card form .submit.move-up .container.send .check{opacity:1}#research-contact main .card form .submit .submit-button{margin:3vh auto 0;font-size:1.6em;padding:14px 23px;border-radius:50px}#research-contact main .card form .checking{position:absolute;height:110%;width:110%;background:#fff;top:0;left:0;z-index:50;display:none}#research-contact main .card form .checking.active{display:block}#research-contact main .card form .checking h3{opacity:0;transition:all .3s}#research-contact main .card form .checking.send h3{margin-top:50px;opacity:1;font-size:30px;text-align:center;line-height:50px}#research-contact .go-back{position:absolute;bottom:20px;left:0;right:0;text-align:center;font-size:20px}@keyframes loadingAnimation{0%{transform:rotate(0deg) translateX(20px) rotate(0deg)}to{transform:rotate(1turn) translateX(20px) rotate(-1turn)}}@media (max-width:767px){#research-contact .background #half-background-img{display:none}#research-contact .background #whole-background-img{display:block}}@media (max-width:575px){#research-contact main .card{margin-top:5px;bottom:auto;width:70vw;height:auto}#research-contact main .card header h2{font-size:24px;margin-bottom:20px}#research-contact main .card header p{line-height:19px}#research-contact main .card form{width:270px;margin:0 auto;position:relative}#research-contact main .card form .input-field{width:270px;margin-top:13px}#research-contact main .card form .text-area{width:270px;margin-top:4px}#research-contact main .card form .text-area textarea{min-width:270px;max-width:270px}#research-contact main .card form .checking{position:absolute;height:110%;width:110%;background:#fff;top:0;left:-5%;z-index:50;display:none}#research-contact main .card form .checking h3{font-size:25px}}strong{font-weight:500}.clearfix:after{content:"";clear:both;display:block}.hide{display:none}
